conclusion: Analyze forces on block P and board ab to find frictional force by ground.
Block P slides on board ab with velocity v.
Forces on block P: gravitational force mg, normal force N_P, kinetic friction f_{P,ab}.
Normal force N_P equals gravitational force mg.
Frictional force on block P is f_{P,ab} = μ2 mg.
Forces on board ab: gravitational force Mg, normal force N_{ab}, frictional force from block P, frictional force from ground.
Frictional force from ground on board ab is f_{ground} = μ2 mg.
